yeah so it has auto driving which sounds and is disgusting. and when i try to switch to manual controls, it says 'synchronizing' and the screen gets stuck there... yeah you guys can keep this game to yourself. i am already generous with my review considering how distasteful i found the concept of automatic driving in a goddamn racing game.

overall, i have no issues for the game. it's quite good and entertaining. i would love it if it was a bit more optimized for low end devices. but i do have something that really pisses me off. the randomization of the showroom card packs are so bad, that i want to kill myself right now. i spent almost a whole week continuously grinding for the renault rs 0.1. it promised me total 148 blueprints. but, i was still short in 46 blueprints after all of that. please gameloft, fix this issue.

the cars were bugged out. sometimes they block the whole screen, i dont see much problems with the gameplay but its mostly about the cars and the graphics. the graphics need to be optional and more display settings. gameloft if you made asphalt 9 that good, you gotta do better on this one. please take your time fixing these problems.

graphics are great, the customization is alright. just the progress is what's bothering me. i've reached a point in my career where i can't progress and have underpowered cars, the same going for the special events - if i have the required car, that is. neither in multi-player matches do i win, since i always wind up being the one with the lowest stats, and slowest car somehow. now i barely have any way of making cash, and it's not fun, since i need alot just to upgrade one car, on a single stat.

the core gameplay & the driving is fun and the constant stream of new events/content keep the game feeling fresh. however, the entire progression system being based on opening packs and the insane amount of microtransactions in the game makes it so you will never be able to unlock most of the content/cars without spending a large sum of money. the fuel system is also a huge drawback, only being able to use a car 3 times on a 6 hour cooldown is disappointing at best.

really liking the game, it doesn't feel too much of a chore to collect blueprints. however, the transition from asphalt 9 to legends unite made my game to crash unexpectedly a few times alreay. hope this can be fixed. please optimize the game so it can be very enjoyable again. edit: remove the cops from credits challenge/time attacks because they seriously aren't needed when you're trying to achieve a certain time. add to that fact that they tank massive damage before crashing.

a best racing game and also for the career mode, one thing i qquite don't like is the graphics. even if the high quality visual it isn't even worth it, only works for higher end phones that automatically enables advance graphics option like smoke particles, god rays, bloom, blur, dof, anti aliasing, i wish it could be available all the devices to see if it's lagging or not so that we could have a better experience at it. especially for higher mid range phones, make it available soon!!🫡🫡

it's better than the previous one. but one thing. for pc and nintendo switch users, if you could add haptic feedback on controllers like it used to be on the switch. also, add the water droplets on low graphics for asphalt 9 unite for pc. would rate it 5 stars!! and also, include a new feature of choosing our own music, same as asphalt 8 !!

weird ui, high prices for tiny things, still a great game. but after making my first 3 purchases yesterday i'm getting a constant purchase failed error but i've still been charged and the content isn't coming through. i play on the ps5 and actually prefer this android version. but it needs little fixes. the difficulty backing out of some screens, and remove the "view car" on the home screen. i'm on a pixel 8 pro using gestures and it's a nightmare to close the app without force closing.

i started a9 a few months after launch and thoroughly enjoyed it, although i've lost interest when it was "upgraded" to unite. what was once a great arcade racing experience is now just a game. i feel the game has been downgraded in terms of graphics, perhaps there wasnt much thought given to the game as there was to grab my cash. disappointed.

after the unite update, my phone is now a literal potable stove (xiaomi poco x3 pro) and the graphics looks much worse and more heavy with lots of fps drops, especially paris track, the old graphics engine should have been kept in game settings in case of any major problems with the new engine which is present right now! also why i can't change graphics settings in details as in the pc version? that makes no sense..

hello! thanks for your reply! we are doing our best at balancing the game so that everyone can have an exciting and engaging experience. we will definitely share your feedback with the team so we can keep making the game better.

this game has become so p2w...i am an advanced player and it is really hard now to progress in the game when the new, good cars have really hard and p2w events. i think these events should have more to do with skill than with how much money you have in the bank or how many tokens you've saved up. i'm not the only one who thinks this, my classmates and many community members think the same. also i would like to see a rework to mp rush series. all you need is time, not skill to get the top rewards.

riddled with server issues not connecting. our wifi or data always connecting but just not to the game. other players have voice the same on and off but still no solution. please fix and update your server to cater to many. another bug is laferrari a class car is never available via credits purchase, only tokens. why is this so? and the text message censor almost every word.

this is a great game , 5 stars but if is still lacking after the update . this update has brought new and wonderful improvements with drawbacks , which are fixable by the way . these include the high resolution, the gameloft developers should create an option for lower resolution for lower end devices, secondly the game in multiplayer is missing massaging and an option to use a mic while playing with friends, this is why my friends did not want to play this game at first.

all things are good...but graphics are the backbone of the game...the gameplay graphics are still poor and display graphics also (means when we see cars in garage)...please work on this...this thing is not resolved yet since the unite version is released...developers worked well on the pc version but not on android version...too excited to see clear graphics! 🙂

the game is fun, but only till the first chapter. in the second one, you'll soon run out of cars unless you don't spend money on the game. the multiplayer is also fair only till silver 4, after that, if in case you're an f2p and don't have cars, trial cars won't do you any good, you'll face opponents over 1.2k above your own car's rank knocking you down everytime. so yeah, it's very tough to advance in the game as an f2p, unless ofc you've been playing asphalt 9 since its release.

game is good as all games before. but 1 crucial thing is please don't push too many adds. it spoils the gaming experience. i understand that it's mentioned contains adds. but pushing adds after each race and no option to move forward without watching the add, ruins the excitement and experience.

this is the best stunt racing game on android, but i've dropped my rating from 4 to 3 stars. the advertising and painfully slow progression have only become worse as more content has been added to the game. for example, the single player campaign is downright impossible without splurging on car packs that won't even give you what you want. i would recommend looking for a different racing game if you want to truly feel immersed and free.

knockdowns, ugghhhh!!! knockdowns simply shouldn't exist in multiplayer let alone races that last for less than 90 seconds! also, relax with the blueprints a little. pretty sure you guys make plenty of money from ads already. game has such potential, graphics are the best i have seen. but few issues ruin the experience so much that you don't wanna play again.

it's a great installment to the asphalt racing series. i really like the realistic feeling of the racing itself and the cars look detailed and beautiful. being able to rotate it 360° gives you the whole car visuals. also, the graphics are cool. opening packs are a joy! the issues i have is the grinding involved in game. even though the gameplay is fun, it feels like a job after a while. also, the tracks, music & environments start feeling repetitive. something fresh & new is needed in the game!

the game is awesome, the graphics and feel is awesome, just like the previous games but where it differs is that there's a new blueprint system which is not fun, just seems like a gimmick to encourage microtransactions and unlike its predecessor it requires a very good and constant internet connection, running this on mobile data is torture. hope this is fixed soon.

the game itself is quite immersive and keeps you hooked for months. however, the special events are sometimes very restrictive in terms of rewards and thus it's quite immature for a newbie to start hoping for awesome cars right at the start. the race tracks seem to get repetitive after a couple of days but the adrenaline rush during the races does manage to make up for this by a long shot. however, this doesn't make for giving new players hard time collecting or upgrading cars.

the best game . my favourite game indeed . the wonderful and awesome graphics but i gave it only 3 stars because there are too many ads and some are not even able to be closed , and then we have resstart the game. there is a ad after every race so my suggestion is to reduce the ads. if u reduce the ads i will tell my friends also to play.

good game, one of best racing games. but with drawbacks. everything takes money. 1. need to buy multiplayer passes for all mp rewards. 2. need to buy legend pass for all legend pass rewards. this one is fine though. all games has this mechanic. 3. need to buy event pass for all events. 4. need overclock pass to overclock all cars. you need a subscription fee for almost everything.
